title: Can we replace teambuilder queue with Normals draft pick?
body:
Lets face it. Teambuilder on OCE is an epic failure. Queue times can take upwards of 1 hour because no one wants to sit in a lobby for 30 minutes. Give us back Draft pick instead of this useless teambuilder crap, at least then we can play norms without seeing ekko and riven every game.

OR

Give us dominion.

For those newer players who do not know what draft pick is, its basically the same as ranked champ select. The only difference is that you dont actually gain or lose LP. So that means bans and pick order pretty much.

EDIT: Imagine in the poll Teambuilder equals keep teambuilder and draft pick equals replace teambuilder since I sorta forgot about dominion being an option.

replies.body: teambuilder sucks a fat one.... y not have both? normal draft and dominion?

teambuilder is the optimal best option since it creates as perfect a team as you can get. the reason it takes so long is cos people dont play supp and/or adc. at least in blind pick/drafting people are forced (sometimes) to play a position they dont want to, and if they end up still going where they want, you've wasted a whole games worth of time and you've pretty much lost because of toxic duo mid laners or whatever
Or you could actually encourage people to play team builder and not have to put up with the crappy waiting times, just a thought.

Yes but then a circular problem remains.

People don't play TB because any time they try the queue times are ridiculous.
And because of this Queue times are ridiculous.

In theory it sounds good to just say everyone should go play it, in reality it's not going to work.
how about instead of normals draft picks, they bring back Dominion :D i think yes, but i agree 100% with team builder being garbage and should be replaced.
I wouldn't mind dominion either. Ill edit the poll to be replace teambuilder/keep teambuilder.
I've never played Normal Draft; only Ranked. For starters, Normal Draft will easily help newer players get used to picking and banning and counter picking, etc. Helps them out a bit too!
team building's waiting is way too long, I believe the only way to make that queue shorter maybe to bring back the public chat (just a thought :D)

the only sure way to get people to use teambuilder is to remove blind pick.

outside of ranked;
the priority queue should be normal draft: the whole point of norms is practise, no draft wtf?
the secondary queue should be team builder
I have played a lot of aram but honestly don't care for it.

people would complain way too much if there was no blind pick option to play their power picks without ban phase... teambuilder should fill this need and it should attempt to not match mirrored champions if possible. normal blind pick is no better than aram and I would be happy to see it deleted in favour of teambuilder actually getting used because although I agree that its a huge failure in our region the concept is good.

considering the nature of blind pick and its balance issues its removal in favour of properly stressing the teambuilder queue should be a good thing.
